{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hitron |model=HT-EMN3 |fcc_date=08/30/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=range extender |fcc_id=2AHKM-HTEMN3 |ic_id=10778A-HTEMN3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1707-AMTH, CTPBWK14, DTPC3R92; |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYK0 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603E;MEDIATEK, MT7603EN, 1706-BMJL, CTPC3Y47; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1650-BFSL, ACMSYCKJ; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=MoCA 2.0 Gigabit Chip;MaxLinear;MxL3705;MxL, MXL3705, K01W3.02, 1648CC;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, MoCA 2.0 Channel Bonding, TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
